titles.title: Yeshu Ne Hume Shanti Diya Hai

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v2 v3

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Yeshu ne hume shanti diya hai
Yeshu ne hume shanti diya hai

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Isliye gayenge, sabko bathanyenge
Ek hi raja yeshu masih hai

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Yeshu ne humne anand diya hai
Yeshu ne humne changa kiya hai
Yeshu ne humne mukti diya hai
